summary: A Skyrim remake of my popular Oblivion mod, \"Real Days and Months\", which adds the real days and months on the sleep/wait menu.
descriptionHtml:
~A Skyrim remake of my popular Oblivion mod, \"Real Days and Months\", which adds the real days and months on the sleep/wait menu.


~Installation
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary. 
3. Copy files to (install folder) your Skyrim Data folder. 
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file \"Real Days.esp\" and \"Real Months.esp\".


~Uninstallation 
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s). 
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod: 

a. \"Real Days.esp\"
b. \"Real Months.esp\"


~Incompatibility 
None known, except for other mods that change the days/months.


~Known Issues or Bugs 
None known. If any more are found, please tell me on the comments!


~LoganZezima

IF YOU LIKE THIS MOD, PLEASE ENDORSE IT AND COMMENT! THANK YOU!
author: LoganZezima
